title: Classics Brawlers, Rising Superstars, and Wily Veterans: Who Will Be the Best Sprinter in the Giro d’Italia?
content:
Can Kooij confirm? Will Pedersen and Van Aert run riot? What of old dog Bennett? A range of rider characteristics and stage profiles leave things up in the air for the Giro’s sprinters.

Read the full article at Classics Brawlers, Rising Superstars, and Wily Veterans: Who Will Be the Best Sprinter in the Giro d’Italia? on Velo.
author: sstokes
